tr.td:
[Saturday 04:15:45 PM] JavaAIMBot: Help for List Module:
LISTS (shows all the current lists.)
SUBSCRIBE <LISTNAME> (subscribe yourself to the named list.)
UNSUBSCRIBE <LISTNAME> (unsubscribe yourself from the named list.)
POST <LISTNAME> <MESSAGE> (will post the message to everyone in the list. Offline members will be told when they sign on.)
MEMBERS <LISTNAME> (will show the members of everyone in the list. *ADMIN ONLY*)
MAKELIST <LISTNAME> (creates a new list. *ADMIN ONLY*)

[Saturday 04:26:35 PM] JavaAIMBot: Help for MegaHal Module
MEGAHAL commands:
megahaladmin save - saves the megahal brain
megahaladmin think N - sets the think time to N seconds.

[Saturday 04:27:08 PM] JavaAIMBot: Help for Messenger Module
TELL <MESSAGE> (sends a message to a person inthe system, if they are offline they will recieve the message next time they log in)
OFFLINE <MESSAGE> (will notify the person the next time they log in)
CLEAR MESSAGES (will erase messages in system for user)
SHOW MESSAGES (will display all the messages left for a user)
* If the preference "savemessages" is set to true, the user will need to manually clear messages.
[Saturday 04:27:29 PM] larryMadeUpName: tell jonnyOffline Hey whats up?

[Saturday 04:27:30 PM] JavaAIMBot: User jonnyOffline does not exist in the system.
Use the ADDUSER command to add them.

[Saturday 04:30:18 PM] JavaAIMBot: Help for Telnet Module
The Telnet module does not support commands through this interface.

[Saturday 04:30:25 PM] JavaAIMBot: Help for User Administration Module
ADDUSER (adds a user to the list, along with allowing for admin perms)
RMUSER (removes a user from the list)
[Saturday 04:30:37 PM] JavaAIMBot: User jonnyOffline already exists in the system.
